name: Aztec Tower The Return
description:
A game made in a 24 hour game jam by the Fellowship of the Game.

The red shadows are turrets you can buy, stand on them and press X to buy.

Controls:

  • Attack with Z.
  • Buy a turret with X, costs 1 heart.
  • Special attack with C, costs 10 hearts, kills all enemies.

Game by:

  • Abner Santos (Github Itch)
  • Gabriel de Moura (Github Itch)
  • Henrique Camillo (Github Itch)

 Source code at: https://github.com/dmdemoura/AztecTowerTheReturn
